entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023
